alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 4:26AM CDT until August 08 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 425 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Union City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southwestern Oklahoma City, Newcastle, Blanchard, Mustang, Tuttle, Union City, Minco, Amber, Bridge Creek, and Pocasset. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
